tool.name: PON Filter
tool.description: Filter or remove variants from a sample VCF based on a panel of normals VCF.
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/pon_filt.py "${pon}" "${infile}" "${outfile}" "${outfile_bad}"
#if $min_cnt --min_cnt "${min_cnt}" #end if
#if $pon_flag_above --pon_flag_above "${pon_flag_above}" #end if
#if $pon_flag_below --pon_flag_below "${pon_flag_below}" #end if
#if $no_clinvar_rm "${no_clinvar_rm}" #end if
#if $bkgd_avg --bkgd_avg "${bkgd_avg}" #end if
#if $bkgd_std --bkgd_std "${bkgd_std}" #end if
#if $bkgd_pass_flag --bkgd_pass_flag "${bkgd_pass_flag}" #end if
#if $bkgd_min_cnt --bkgd_min_cnt "${bkgd_min_cnt}" #end if

param.name: pon
param.label: Panel of Normals
param.help: PON used for comparison against input VCF.

param.name: min_cnt
param.label: Min Count
param.help: Minimum count required to filter non-background PON sites.

param.name: pon_flag_above
param.label: PON Found Flag Above
param.help: Flag applied in FILTER column of VCF for calls that do exceed Min Count, and that do not fall within assessed background regions.

param.name: pon_flag_below
param.label: PON Found Flag Below
param.help: Flag applied in FILTER column of VCF for calls that do not exceed Min Count, and that do not fall within assessed background regions.

param.name: no_clinvar_rm
param.label: Keep ClinVar?
param.help: If the call is in ClinVar, and is not benign, do not remove the entry based on min_cnt thresholds.

param.name: bkgd_avg
param.label: Max Background Mean
param.help: Maximum PON mean used to assess background calls.

param.name: bkgd_std
param.label: Max Background Stdev
param.help: Maximum PON stdev used to assess background calls.

param.name: bkgd_pass_flag
param.label: Background Pass Flag
param.help: Flag applied in FILTER column of VCF for PON calls falling outside of background.

param.name: bkgd_min_cnt
param.label: Background Min Count
param.help: Minimum count required to assess background PON sites.

tool.help: Filter or remove variants from a sample VCF based on a panel of normals VCF.
